pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī saṅghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.3: “saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.4: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṅgho na kiñci āha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.5: Tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— ‘bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Viviccathāyye. Vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṅgho vaṇṇetī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.7: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā saṅghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.8: saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.11: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī saṅghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.12: saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.13: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṅgho na kiñci āha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.14: Tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Viviccathāyye. Vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṅgho vaṇṇetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.17: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī saṅghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vakkhati—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.18: saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.22: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.24: ‘saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.25: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṅgho na kiñci āha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.26: Tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Viviccathāyye. Vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṅgho vaṇṇetī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.29: saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.30: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṅgho na kiñci āha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.31: Tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha— bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Viviccathāyye. Vivekaññeva bhaginīnaṃ saṅgho vaṇṇetī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.32: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.33: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsīyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:1.34: no ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī yāvatatiyakaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṅghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.6: “saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.7: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā. Tā saṅgho na kiñci āha”.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.19: “bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.24: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.26: ‘saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.36: ‘saṃsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharittha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.47: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṅghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.50: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.52: Tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.53: bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.57: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṃ, saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.60: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī saṅghena samanubhaṭṭhā bhikkhuniyo evaṃ vadeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.63: Santi saṅghe aññāpi bhikkhuniyo evācārā evaṃsaddā evaṃsilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.65: Tumhaññeva saṅgho uññāya paribhavena akkhantiyā vebhassiyā dubbalyā evamāha—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.66: bhaginiyo kho saṃsaṭṭhā viharanti pāpācārā pāpasaddā pāpasilokā, bhikkhunisaṅghassa vihesikā, aññamaññissā vajjappaṭicchādikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.70: Saṅgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.71: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.75: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṅghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.76: Khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.80: Saṅghādisesaṃ ajjhāpajjantiyā ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi kammavācāhi thullaccayā paṭippassambhanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.88: saṅghova tassā āpattiyā mānattaṃ deti, mūlāya paṭikassati, abbheti, na sambahulā na ekā bhikkhunī. Tena vuccati “saṅghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:2.89: Tasseva āpattinikāyassa nāmakammaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tenapi vuccati “saṅghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.2: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.14: Uddiṭṭhā kho, ayyāyo, sattarasa saṅghādisesā dhammā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.16: Yesaṃ bhikkhunī aññataraṃ vā aññataraṃ vā āpajjati, tāya bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe pakkhamānattaṃ caritabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.17: Ciṇṇamānattā bhikkhunī yattha siyā vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṅgho tattha sā bhikkhunī abbhetabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.18: Ekāyapi ce ūno vīsatigaṇo bhikkhunisaṅgho taṃ bhikkhuniṃ abbheyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss13:3.19: Sā ca bhikkhunī anabbhitā, tā ca bhikkhuniyo gārayhā, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
